contest-event.event-date:
May 25, 1904 D Nottingham Contest
Nottingham Contest 0 Other
nottingham-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Anna Bolena [arr. Round]
Ruddington Hall Park, Nottingham 2nd day of contests at the Notts Agricultural Show Open to bands that had not won a cash prize of £20 the previous year. Prizes: £12, £7, £4, £3, £2 Waltz contest: 1. Hucknall Silver, 2. Hucknall Excelsior, 3. Lea Mills. 9 bands competed.
Aug. 25, 2013, 10:44 p.m. Aug. 27, 2018, 9:35 a.m.
1 Hucknall Gospel Temperance John Gladney Jnr
2 Hucknall Excelsior Alexander Owen
3 Lea Mills Alexander Owen
4 Newstead Colliery J. E. Fidler
5 East Kirkby United Randolph Ryan
Unknown Result South Notts Silver George Hames
Unknown Result Riddings Band George Hames
Unknown Result Loughborough Alexander Owen
Unknown Result Nottingham Railway City R. Mills
